docs.title: Welcome!
docs.text:
PyData Kraków is a community of Data and ML enthusiats in Kraków, part of the PyData.org network.

PyData is a trademark of NumFocus

docs.title: Meetup
docs.text: If you would like to see our next and previous meetups, you can check our Meetup Page

docs.title: Submitting talk idea
docs.text: If you have an idea for a talk you can submit it using this this form

docs.title: Discord
docs.text:
Our main communication channel is our discord. It’s mostly in polish, but everyone speaks english too. :)

Here's the invite

docs.title: Email
docs.text: If you want to contact us via email you can do here: hello at pydatakrk pl

docs.title: LinkedIn and Facebook
docs.text: Here’s a link to our LinkedIN and Facebook

docs.title: Who did this?
docs.text: This website (and discord, and meetup page, etc) is maintained by Maciej and Artur
